column1: The Pit Room////Meh... went with the two meat dinner. Chose Brisket and Venison sausage
column3: and Mustard Potato Salad. Side items were bland and needed some salt. Portion size on all items was sufficient for the price. Venison sausage was dry and brisket was a little tough. Brisket did have good flavor and their sauce was really good. Venison sausage had good taste and a bit spicy but couldn't get past the dryness. I did enjoy their homemade condiments and pickle bar. Place was pretty clean and decor was cool. I feel you pay for the marketing of the place vs quality.
